title: Dukkah flatbread with goat cheese-yoghurt dip
ingredients: ['Flatbread', '450g prepared pizza dough', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 teaspoons fine polenta', 'Goat cheese-yoghurt dip', '100g plain Greek yoghurt', '60g chevre (soft goat cheese), crumbled', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '1/2 teaspoon chopped fresh dill', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '4 tablespoons dukkah spice blend']
